SEARCH
Package app.src

Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
app.src.Utilities
public class Utilities extends Object
Provides functionalitites like - image rotation, - angle calculation between two points. - scaling of 2D values and Images

      Takes 2 Points, calculates and returns the direct distance between them

      Returns:
      rect distance between the two Points

    • calcAngle

      public static double calcAngle(Point P1, Point P2)
      Calculates the angle between two points in radiants, the angle is calculated above the base with the value 0 pointing north.
      Parameters:
      P1 - basepoint for calculation
      P2 - point to which the angle points
      Returns:
      calculated angle in radians
      See Also:
      • Point

    • scaleSize

      public static Point scaleSize(int originalX, int originalY, double factor)
      Takes x and y values before scaling and multiplies them with the factor.
      Parameters:
      originalX - x value before scaling
      originalY - y value before scaling
      factor - scaling factor
      Returns:
      scaled x and y values as a Point

    • scaleImage

      Parameters:

      factor - scaling factor
      Returns:
      scaled image

      public static BufferedImage rotateImage(BufferedImage image, double angle)
      Takes a BufferedImage, rotates it and returns the rotated image.
      Parameters:

      angle - the rotation angle
      Returns:
